channel.title: [C4D] Contest
channel.description:
So I have an idea about something that will def. help many of you interested in C4D. A contest. Maybe set up as stickies or a forum of it's own or whatever. But I need your help now.
We'd need to decide on a few things so I want a lot of suggestions.
Either I could come up with the contests or have some suggestions. Weekly most likely. All entries posted in a thread and voted on. Maybe best model or best scene mentions as well. Even if just a few people join it would help them.
This would help people who can't come up with ideas, try something new, and still learn.
Everyone would be encouraged to use reference images and model it for what it is. They would be judged on most exactness (lol) and not necessarily render settings as most people won't have that yet. Or they maybe be seperate challenges where I provide a model and everyone textures it. In my experience that REALLY helps.
So. If anyone is interested I'm all in. I probably won't be joining in these unless I provide the model for everyone else. I'll provide a few references or suggestions or anything else.
Just post here your thoughts or suggestions on how this could work.

item.title: [C4D] Contest
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

I’d join lol. Of course I’d be in the beginner section, but meh

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Contest
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Ok I’ll start the first one in a new topic.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Contest
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Agreed, this will work.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Contest
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

It sounds interesting, I guess I could give it a shot.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Contest
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

That’s what I was getting at earlier. Even if he wins, you still get lots of experience.

And also, it’d be a whole scene. And that wouldn’t be the whole competition. There’d be different types of competitions.

I just want feedback so we can do this ASAP.

I think it’ll work.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Contest
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Zameix:

Then Frell is going to come on top each and every time. Just a thought.

Maybe, but there still is a chance you might do surprisingly better than you think you will. Besides, you will learn alot more from this.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Contest
item.dc:creator: @Zameix Zameix
item.description:
@Zameix wrote:

Carrying on from what Kaza pointed out, the idea of the person running the competition supplying the objects/models etc and the people that enter have to give the model a scene to fit in.

And again putting the entrants into ability levels would be good because if there’s for example.

Me
Frell
John
David

etc. Then Frell is going to come on top each and every time. Just a thought.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Contest
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Any 3D modeling software, I was just saying C4D because I’ve gotten the community into it.

And it doesn’t matter the amount of people if anyone’s up to it.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Contest
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

Does this include 3dsMax/Blender/etc., or is it just limited to C4D?

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Contest
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

There will only be 3 or 4 people entering from what i’ve seen posted in this section…

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Contest
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

No poll because too many options to pick from, I think it’s better if you just post answers.
I’m saying that even if there’s only a few, it’s still good. It helps the few there are tremendously. And it entices others.

I won’t be participating. And if I am, it’s just providing things.

There will be pretty mechanical straight forward ones like model this exactly. And ones that are very open ended like come up with the best design.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Contest
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

Well, it’s going to be a bit one sided if you’re in it STH.

Maybe you could have 2 Ranks -

Experienced Users -

C4D Beginners -

So if you entered, you would be Experienced, probably along with Frell, and whoever. And the people who are doing pens ect are in beginners.

Anyone who enters has to show print screen of it in Cinema 4D, or the .c4d. (What ever the equivalent to a .psd in PS)

For the contest, you could get a scene of objects, and see who can re-create the scene best but re-arranged, or who can make the best scene with a certain object.

Just my thoughts :D.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Contest
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Good idea. It will give me ideas

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Contest
item.dc:creator: @Zameix Zameix
item.description:
@Zameix wrote:

Agreed ^

Although it’s a good idea i’m not sure many people would be interested, as only a small majority of the Graphics section users actually use C4D.

If it did take off then I would be more than happy to enter.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Contest
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

Why don’t you make a poll to actually see who’s interested.

Read full topic
